about_the_game:
Welcome to Food Inc: Home of the Supply

        A cooperative adventure that invites you to build and improve your own farm! Up to 4 players you can plant crops as the seasons change, construct buildings for your needs and heal your animals when needed.

        Ride your horse and step into the shoes of a real farmer with an immersive third and first person view. Discover every part of food inc: Home of the Supply, a game that blends realistic elements with arcade ones.

        Explore the villages from the desert while collecting recources and unlocking new things. Discover the hole desert with your pickup truck and enjoy the unknown.

        Drive around to pick and deliver packages in order to improve your farming skills. Remember to feed your animals regularly so they can grow, and check on them frequently to heal any that may have gotten sick.

All you can do and much more to come

        In food Inc: Home of the Supply, you can: construct buildings, plant crops and trees, gather resources, unlock new skills, complete missions, expand your farm by unlocking new zones, complete achievements, unlock skins for your farmer and horse, raise animals, discover new areas, go fishing and mining, care for bees, refine new items, ride your horse through the farm, drive your pickup through the desert, and do all of this with your friends.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Food Inc: Home of the Supply

        A cooperative adventure that invites you to build and improve your own farm! Up to 4 players you can plant crops as the seasons change, construct buildings for your needs and heal your animals when needed.

        Ride your horse and step into the shoes of a real farmer with an immersive third and first person view. Discover every part of food inc: Home of the Supply, a game that blends realistic elements with arcade ones.

        Explore the villages from the desert while collecting recources and unlocking new things. Discover the hole desert with your pickup truck and enjoy the unknown.

        Drive around to pick and deliver packages in order to improve your farming skills. Remember to feed your animals regularly so they can grow, and check on them frequently to heal any that may have gotten sick.

All you can do and much more to come

        In food Inc: Home of the Supply, you can: construct buildings, plant crops and trees, gather resources, unlock new skills, complete missions, expand your farm by unlocking new zones, complete achievements, unlock skins for your farmer and horse, raise animals, discover new areas, go fishing and mining, care for bees, refine new items, ride your horse through the farm, drive your pickup through the desert, and do all of this with your friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 / Equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 / Equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600 / Equal
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 / Equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a farm co-op game where you can build, plant crops, care for animals and much more. In this game you can ride and drive while doing missions and expanding the farm. Inspired by real world elements like seasons and animal lifespan, food inc aim to deliver a fun and simple arcade gameplay.
